Job Posting: 177954 - Position: S26 AI Scientist Co-op 177954 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/09/2026 11:59 PM Through Employer Website 02/02/2026 02:33 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country CIBC 25 King Street West Toronto M5L 1A2 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION 2026 - Summer S26 AI Scientist Co-op 177954 Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months CAD Salary Not Available, 37.5 Major List Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description Job Title: AI Scientist Co-op Job ID: 2602694 Application Deadline: February 9, 2026 What you'll be doing The Advanced Analytics and AI team is a central hub of data science and AI expertise at CIBC, leading the way in applying best practices in predictive science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, while leveraging the latest big data technology platforms. We also collaborate with leading academic institutions in the fields of AI and machine learning to promote the exchange of the latest technological developments and to enrich our talent pool. As an AI Scientist, you will apply your knowledge and experience in AI/ML techniques to solve challenging business problems and bring innovative solutions. You will interact with diverse groups of partners across the organization and work with real-world structured and unstructured datasets to produce end- to-end solutions, taking models from experimentation to deployment. At CIBC, we provide a work environment designed to help you thrive in your role. You will have the flexibility to manage your work activities within a hybrid arrangement, spending 1-3 days per week on-site, with the remaining days remote. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Hiring Manager Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://cibc.wd3.myworkdayjobs.com/campus/job/Toronto-ON/AI-Scientist-Co-op_2602694 Application Deadline: February 9, 2026 Important • We may ask you to complete an attribute-based assessment and other skills tests (such as simulation, coding, French proficiency, MS Office). Our goal for the application process is to get to know more about you, all that you have to offer, and give you the opportunity to learn more about us. • You must be currently enrolled in post-secondary education and returning to full-time studies to be eligible. However, you do not need to be in a registered Co-Op program to be considered for a role. • Recruitment timeline: Applications review - January/February; Interviews - February/March; Offers - February/March • Please include your resume (no more than 2 pages), a cover letter (no more than 1 page), and your most recent unofficial transcript with your application. These should all be uploaded into the Resume section of the application as one pdf document This is 4-month co-op opportunity. • Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
